alert.note: Alert for Transylvania (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 2:20PM EDT until August 24 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Transylvania County in western North Carolina... Northwestern Greenville County in Upstate South Carolina... Northwestern Pickens County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 220 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Brevard, or 4 miles northwest of Rosman, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Rosman, Lake Toxaway, Jocassee Gorges, Gorges State Park, Keowee Toxaway State Park, Table Rock State Park, Caesars Head State Park, Pumpkintown, Balsam Grove and Connestee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
